section.heading: Procedure, generally, on appeal from District of Columbia Court of Appeals; record; rules of court

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Section 29 of D.C. Law 15-354 provided that Title 17 is designated Title 17 of the District of Columbia Official Code.
